author: Vijay Jolapara
text: My saddest day , ASI is doing this, when will we learn https://t.co/bJhPcsFDGt

author: Vijay Jolapara
text: 2.i from a different mindset and why should I have problem to get photograph. It was a shocker. What does this imply.I culd have lost my https://t.co/BfPXJfBhSa's was my space & privacy is maintained.I had not come to some zoo. Do not commercialize a pure moment. It's ur temple

author: Vijay Jolapara
text:
The scene where the 🔫 say he can even kill his mother & brother as it doesn't matter 2 him.This scene conveys what mindset this 👥 have 4r them religion comes above nation & humanity.
When a gun is pointed at u & u r unarmed,the winner is always the 👥 with the finger on trigger

author: Vijay Jolapara
text: 2. settling for 2k.Can't this people find other place 4r extraction.I am disgusted as a citizen of this city,I am terrified 2 think of what wuld b going thru people 2 face this vultures.Why can't this crematorium b handed 2 non profitable trust 2 run humanely.I expect no replies

author: Vijay Jolapara
text: @Airtel_Presence @airtelindia @TRAI You people are taking me for a ride , you have not upgraded to fiber from your end . You are fooling people around . Kindly disconnect my broadband as I do not want to pay for services which are nonexistent

author: Vijay Jolapara
text: 2. speed has come down to 29 Mbps. Y is there no clear communication and y there is no prior approval about the forced changes on a client. Kindly restore my earlier speed or disconnect it by tomorrow as my daughter is preparing competitive exams for admission abroad.
